roleset.name: follow and harass
roleset.note: DOG-V NOTES: Frames file for 'dog' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. (from dog.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: nice and simple
example.text: Mr. Sculley also indicated that sagging margins, which *trace* dogged the company through most of 1989, began to turn up in the fourth quarter as chip prices eased.
